e: 例⃝「`這~`部~`電影~`舊瓶裝新酒~，`贏得~`了~`中~`老年~`觀眾~`的~`喜愛~」。
d.f: `比喻~`用~`舊~`的~`形式~`表現~`新~`的~`內容~。

francais: (fig.) nouveaux concepts dans une vieille structure
(dicton emprunté de Matthieu 0:17, mais (fig.) signifiant l'opposé
English: lit. new wine in old bottles; fig. new concepts in an old framework
(loan idiom from Matthew 9:17, but fig. meaning is opposite)
